web/src/components/machines/MachineCard..description: Added aria-live region (role="status", aria-live="polite") to announce copy feedback to screen readers. Uses copyAnnouncement state to provide contextual messages like "Endereço IP copiado!" for IP copy, "Comando SSH copiado!" for SSH command copy, and "Configuração SSH copiada!" for SSH config copy.

web/src/components/tailadmin-ui/index.js.description: DropdownMenu now has full keyboard navigation: DropdownContext provides focusedIndex, menuItemsRef, triggerRef, and registerMenuItem for keyboard navigation. DropdownMenuTrigger handles Enter/Space/Arrow to open menu. DropdownMenuContent handles Escape/Arrow/Home/End/Tab navigation. DropdownMenuItem registers itself and handles Enter/Space activation. Focus ring styles added for keyboard visibility.

web/src/components/Tooltip.jsx.description: Tooltip.jsx already has good accessibility patterns: uses role='tooltip', has aria-label on HelpTooltip component, and handles focus/blur events. Can use as reference for accessibility patterns.
